description_en: The Cairo Citadel is a medieval Islamic-era fortification in Cairo, built by Salah ad-Din and further developed by subsequent Egyptian rulers.
description_ar: قلعة صلاح الدين هي تحصين من العصور الوسطى الإسلامية في القاهرة، بناها صلاح الدين وطورها حكام مصر اللاحقون.
tips: Visit the Mohammed Ali Mosque inside the citadel
Go to the terrace for panoramic views of Cairo
Bring water and wear comfortable shoes
